      • processScpAlert

        boolean processScpAlert(IFIXMessage mess)
        Process SCP Alert
        Parameters:
        mess - SCP Alert message internally represented as a custom FIX message return true if severity is fatal => session is to be closed
        Returns:
        true if session needs to be dropped

      • checkAndGenerateScpAlert

        void checkAndGenerateScpAlert(Exception ex,
                              boolean sessionIsToBeClosed,
                              String info)
        Check if we should generate an SCP alert. Case 1 - The exception was thrown when handling an incoming SCP alert. In this case we don't generate an alert (otherwise it will be a catch 22) Case 2 - Check if the exception has a root cause which implement the ScpAlertCapable interface If found then generate an SCP alert and get the value of alert attributes from the exception Case 3- If not found then generate an SCP alert only if: - session is to be closed - the exception is not a SocketException (otherwise we cannot send the alert) or EOFException (Problem happened while reading the socket).
        Parameters:
        ex - Exception
        sessionIsToBeClosed - The session is going to be closed
        info - Added info
